mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TitleEffect WHERE titleNum = #{titleNum} AND statNum = #{statNum} AND statType = #{statType};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TitleEffect (titleNum, statNum, statType, statValue) VALUES (#{titleNum}, #{statNum}, #{statType}, #{statValue});
mapper.update: UPDATE TitleEffect SET statValue = #{statValue} WHERE titleNum = #{titleNum} AND statNum = #{statNum} AND statType = #{statType};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TitleEffect WHERE titleNum = #{titleNum} AND statNum = #{statNum} AND statType = #{statType};
